00040 typedef struct l4_sched_cpu_set_t
00041 {
00045   l4_umword_t offset;
00046 
00050   l4_umword_t map;
00051 
00055   unsigned char granularity;
00056 
00057 } l4_sched_cpu_set_t;

00070 l4_sched_cpu_set(l4_umword_t offset, unsigned char granularity,
00071                  l4_umword_t map L4_DEFAULT_PARAM(1)) L4_NOTHROW;

00178 
00185 enum L4_scheduler_ops
00186 {
00187   L4_SCHEDULER_INFO_OP       = 0UL, 
00188   L4_SCHEDULER_RUN_THREAD_OP = 1UL, 
00189   L4_SCHEDULER_IDLE_TIME_OP  = 2UL, 
00190 };
00191 
00192 /*************** Implementations *******************/
00193 
00194 L4_INLINE l4_sched_cpu_set_t
00195 l4_sched_cpu_set(l4_umword_t offset, unsigned char granularity,
00196                  l4_umword_t map) L4_NOTHROW
00197 {
00198   l4_sched_cpu_set_t cs;
00199   cs.offset      = offset;
00200   cs.granularity = granularity;
00201   cs.map         = map;
00202   return cs;
00203 }
00204 
00205 L4_INLINE l4_sched_param_t
00206 l4_sched_param(unsigned prio, l4_cpu_time_t quantum) L4_NOTHROW
00207 {
00208   l4_sched_param_t sp;
00209   sp.prio     = prio;
00210   sp.quantum  = quantum;
00211   sp.affinity = l4_sched_cpu_set(0, ~0, 1);
00212   return sp;
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00217 l4_scheduler_info_u(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler, l4_umword_t *cpu_max,
00218                     l4_sched_cpu_set_t *cpus, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00219 {
00220   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00221   l4_msgtag_t res;
00222 
00223   m->mr[0] = L4_SCHEDULER_INFO_OP;
00224   m->mr[1] = (cpus->granularity << 24) | cpus->offset;
00225 
00226   res = l4_ipc_call(scheduler, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_SCHEDULER, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00227 
00228   if (l4_msgtag_has_error(res))
00229     return res;
00230 
00231   cpus->map = m->mr[0];
00232 
00233   if (cpu_max)
00234     *cpu_max = m->mr[1];
00235 
00236   return res;
00237 }
00238 
00239 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00240 l4_scheduler_run_thread_u(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler, l4_cap_idx_t thread,
00241                           l4_sched_param_t const *sp, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00242 {
00243   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00244   m->mr[0] = L4_SCHEDULER_RUN_THREAD_OP;
00245   m->mr[1] = (sp->affinity.granularity << 24) | sp->affinity.offset;
00246   m->mr[2] = sp->affinity.map;
00247   m->mr[3] = sp->prio;
00248   m->mr[4] = sp->quantum;
00249   m->mr[5] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00250   m->mr[6] = l4_obj_fpage(thread, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00251 
00252   return l4_ipc_call(scheduler, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_SCHEDULER, 5, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00253 }
00254 
00255 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00256 l4_scheduler_idle_time_u(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler, l4_sched_cpu_set_t const *cpus,
00257                          l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00258 {
00259   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00260   v->mr[0] = L4_SCHEDULER_IDLE_TIME_OP;
00261   v->mr[1] = (cpus->granularity << 24) | cpus->offset;
00262   v->mr[2] = cpus->map;
00263   return l4_ipc_call(scheduler, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_SCHEDULER, 3, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 L4_INLINE int
00268 l4_scheduler_is_online_u(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler, l4_umword_t cpu,
00269                          l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00270 {
00271   l4_sched_cpu_set_t s;
00272   l4_msgtag_t r;
00273   s.offset = cpu;
00274   s.granularity = 0;
00275   r = l4_scheduler_info_u(scheduler, NULL, &s, utcb);
00276   if (l4_msgtag_has_error(r) || l4_msgtag_label(r) < 0)
00277     return 0;
00278 
00279   return s.map & 1;
00280 }
00281 
00282 
00283 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00284 l4_scheduler_info(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler, l4_umword_t *cpu_max,
00285                   l4_sched_cpu_set_t *cpus) L4_NOTHROW
00286 {
00287   return l4_scheduler_info_u(scheduler, cpu_max, cpus, l4_utcb());
00288 }
00289 
00290 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00291 l4_scheduler_run_thread(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler,
00292                         l4_cap_idx_t thread, l4_sched_param_t const *sp) L4_NOTHROW
00293 {
00294   return l4_scheduler_run_thread_u(scheduler, thread, sp, l4_utcb());
00295 }
00296 
00297 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00298 l4_scheduler_idle_time(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler, l4_sched_cpu_set_t const *cpus) L4_NOTHROW
00299 {
00300   return l4_scheduler_idle_time_u(scheduler, cpus, l4_utcb());
00301 }
00302 
00303 L4_INLINE int
00304 l4_scheduler_is_online(l4_cap_idx_t scheduler, l4_umword_t cpu) L4_NOTHROW
00305 {
00306   return l4_scheduler_is_online_u(scheduler, cpu, l4_utcb());
00307 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
